Hello All,

I would like to insert dynamically changing top and side images in MUI demo based on the XAML page opened. I added Style.xaml to my Resources and added image to Main Menu Grid:

<Image Grid.Column="2" Source="/Path/To/Image/File.png" />

This adds a static image to the desired location on top. I need to change this so that the image source changes dynamically by taking the URI from current opened XAML file.

Thanks.
